config.API_KEY: Your google search engine api key
config.HUGGINGFACE_REPO: Your chosen model from Huggingface. (If this value is not empty, it will be used instead of OLLAMA_MODEL)
config.EXCLUDED_SITES: youtube.com, youtu.be, reddit.com, quora.com, amazon.com, foxnews.com, barnesandnoble.com, usatoday.com
